participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Curious and passionate about literature, with a love for exploring new cultures.
participant_1.background: I'd brag about my knowledge of the Beatles' music and history. I like to eat. I'm going to take a break from my work on bitcoins and go hiking in the mountains. I secretly want to be a professional athlete, but I know my parents would never approve. I have a missing pinky toe.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Creative and expressive, with a deep appreciation for the arts and a talent for singing.
participant_2.background: I am a talented singer, and I am proud to be a member of my church choir. I don't play any sports, but I enjoy hiking and biking on my days off. I teach my students about art and share my opinions about art on the internet. I binged on British shows and movies while I was confined to my bed on vacation. My favorite book is Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice.

content.text: I love British shows and movies. I'm looking forward to the next season of Peaky Blinders.
I haven't heard of that one, but I'll check it out. I'm a big fan of Jane Austen, though.
Oh, I love her books! I've read all of them.
Me too! What's your favorite one?
Pride and Prejudice is my favorite. How about you?
I love Pride and Prejudice, too. But I also really like Sense and Sensibility.
That's a good one too. I love how all of her characters are so well-developed.
I've always wanted to go to England and visit the places where she wrote her books.
That would be amazing! I'm sure it would be so much fun to see all the places that inspired her writing.
Me too. I think it would be a really special experience.
